attributes.action: all telephone numbers should be displayed and have tracability
attributes.additional_details:
Everyone gets annoyed when receiving telephone calls from unlisted, private caller, international number especially when TPS registered.

These callers are nuisance callers. There should be a law making all callers display their numbers.

You can argue any point you wish about caller privacy but if they call they should be able to be traced by the recipient of the call who may be having their rights infringed by not having said information
